title: NFL ATL: Week 4 preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 4 preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling recap the “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the San Francisco 49ers and the St. Louis Rams before previewing all the action coming up in Week 4.  The crew also defends its hero picks and talk to their overseas correspondent. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL and #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
